page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: I live in a house which is nearly 300 years old. It is situated on the Worcester boundary. It has 17 rooms and has quite a big garden at the back it has a swimming pool. It has a porch with a wooden door. We have a doorbell which plays tunes. We don't have many neighbours only a house across the road. My mum has a cooker,a fridge,a dishwasher, washing machine and a microwave to help her do her work.My dad has a J.C.B. which he uses to do some of his jobs. My mum goes to Sainsburys once a week to buy most of our food. She goes to town on a Friday to buy extra groceries. She buys tins of beans,fruit,spaghetti and soup. She buys jars of coffee and tea bags. My favourite food is Spaghetti Bolagnaise and Stroganoff and prawns. I do not like any vegetables.
